column5: English
column11: English

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣
やはり、先立つものは金だな。
column5: As I thought, money takes priority over everything else.
column11: As we thought, money takes precedence above all else.

column4:
最新式のマリオネーションギア
を買うにも、金がなければな。
column5: We just don't have the cash to buy a state-of-the-art Marionation Gear.
column11: But, we don't have the cash to buy state-of-the-art Marionation Gear.

column4: やっぱ、最新式は高いなぁ……。
column5: Turns out the latest tech is really expensive after all...
column11: Turns out the latest tech is really expensive after all...

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

column5: So, accordingly...
column11: There's an idea.

column4:
今日は、
仕事をしてもらうぞ。
column5: ...we're putting you to work today.
column11: Today, we'll put you to work.

column4:
マリオネーションギアで
作業をするんだ。
column5: You'll be using the Marionation Gear.
column11: You'll be using the Marionation Gear.

column4:
旧式とはいえ、せっかくマリオ
ネーションギアがあるんだし、
活用しないとね。
column5: They might be old-fashioned, but we did go to the trouble of getting them!
column11: It might be old fashioned, but since we've gone through the trouble of getting our hands on some, you might as well put them to good use.

column4: メリッサ＿しょうがないな

column5: You may as well put them to use and see if you can make some money.
column11: See if you can make some earnings.

column4:
新しいマリオネーションギアを
買う時も、お金が必要になる
からね。
column5: Even when you can afford the newest Marionation Gear, you'll still need money.
column11: Even if you can afford the newest Marionation Gear, you'll still need money.

column4: 少しでも貯めておかないと。
column5: You've got to save up, even if it's just a little.
column11: You need to save up, even if you only put away a little.

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣
仕事内容を説明するぞ。
column5: I'll explain the details of the job.
column11: I'll explain the details of your work.

column4:
町長からの依頼だ。
街に散乱した/c5鉄クズ/c3を回収して
欲しいそうだ。
column5: It's a commission from the mayor. He wants you to collect pieces of /c5scrap iron/c3 scattered around town.
column11: It's a commission from the Mayor. It seems he wants you to collect the pieces of /c5scrap iron/c3 that are scattered around town.

column4:
鉄クズを全部、
トレーラーの近くに集めろ。
column5: You're to gather all of the scrap iron and put it near a trailer.
column11: Gather all of the scrap iron together and put it near the trailer.

column4:
作業のために、
住民には一時的に
避難してもらってある。
column5: The residents have been instructed to temporarily take refuge so the work can go on, but...
column11: The residents have been temporarily instructed to take refuge so that this work can go on.

column4:
だが、時間は短い。
全住民が何時間も街を離れる
わけにはいかないからな。
column5: ...that means time is of the essence. If the locals end up stuck outside for hours, they won't be happy.
column11: But, that means time is of the essence. The locals aren't going to be happy if they end up being stuck around for hours.

column4:
制限時間内にすべての作業を
終えるんだ。
column5: You have to finish everything within a set time limit.
column11: You must finish everything within the set time limit.

column4:
制限時間をこえると
依頼は失敗だ。
迅速にやれ。
column5:
If you go over the time limit, you'll fail the request.
Get it over with it quick.
column11:
If you go over the time limit, you'll have failed the request.
Deal with it quickly.

column5: What an easy job.
column11: It's a simple job.

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣
地味だが、重要な仕事だ。
column5: That may be, but it's still incredibly important.
column11: That may be, but it's still incredibly important.

column4:
そもそも、これは
マリオネーションギアでしか
できない仕事だ。
column5: For one thing, it's a job that wouldn't be possible without Marionation Gear.
column11: To start with, it's a job that wouldn't be possible without the Marionation Gear.

column4:
もし、マリオネーションギアが
なければ、大勢で何日もかかる
作業になる。
column5: If we didn't have Marionation Gear, it'd take lots of people days of hard work to finish off.
column11: If we didn't have the Marionation Gear, it'd take a number of people, days of hard work to finish off.

column4:
これがマリオネーションギア
本来の役割なんだ。
column5: This is just what Marionation Gear were made for.
column11: This is the intended purpose of the Marionation Gear.

column4:
依頼を確認しとくよ。
時間内にすべての鉄クズを
トレーラーの付近まで運ぶ。
column5: We'll check in once you're finished. Move all the iron to the trailer, and keep an eye on the time limit.
column11:
We'll check in once you've finished the request.
Transport all of the scraps of iron and place them near to the trailer, whilst keeping an eye on the time limit.

column5: Righty-o! Let's get started, then!
column11: Righty-oh, we'll let you get started then.
